channel.title: My First Blog
channel.description: Recent content on My First Blog

item.title: How to Use Hugo to Build a Blog
item.description: Quick Start Create a Hugo site using the beautiful blackburn theme. Step 1: Install Hugo Install Hugo on Windows, and on a machine where the Go compiler tool can run. There is lots of talk about “Hugo being written in Go”, but you don’t need to install Go to enjoy Hugo. Just grab a precompiled binary! Download the hugo installation package according to the operating system version.
